name: Unholy Ice
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a flask of unholy water or 5 pounds of powdered silver worth 25 gp)
text: This spell functions as holy ice, except it is made of frozen unholy water rather than holy water.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一份邪水或5磅银粉，价值25gp)
text_zh: 这个法术工作方式如同神圣冰川 (Holy Ice)，不过本法术创造出的是由邪水所构成的冰块而非圣水。
